channel.title: Arch on Jeff Smith
channel.link:
http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/tags/arch/Recent content in Arch on Jeff SmithHugo -- gohugo.ioen-usFri, 22 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000
ERROR: One or more PGP signatures could not be verified when using AURhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-one-or-more-pgp-signatures-could-not-be-verified-when-using-aur/Fri, 22 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-one-or-more-pgp-signatures-could-not-be-verified-when-using-aur/Assuming you trust the dev… gpg --recv-keys <key-id>
Kernel panic - not syncing: no working init foundhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kernel-panic-not-syncing-no-working-init-found/Fri, 22 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kernel-panic-not-syncing-no-working-init-found/Basic steps… mount /dev/sda2 /mnt mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/boot arch-chroot /mnt # or manjaro-chroot mkinitcpio -p linux grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg exit umount -R /mnt reboot From: https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?id=192296
Install EDUP EP-DB1607 on Archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-edup-ep-db1607-on-arch/Sat, 02 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-edup-ep-db1607-on-arch/To install drivers for: EDUP EP-DB1607 Wireless Usb Adapter ac600 grab drivers from AUR: packer rtl8821au-dkms-git
Update mirrors on manjaro linuxhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/update-mirrors-on-manjaro-linux/Wed, 21 Feb 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/update-mirrors-on-manjaro-linux/sudo pacman-mirrors --fasttrack && sudo pacman -Syyu
KDE mouse acceleration too fasthttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-mouse-acceleration-too-fast/Thu, 19 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-mouse-acceleration-too-fast/KDE setttings doesn’t affect mouse acceleration, so we use xinput. Get the mouse id: xinput list Get all the props for the mouse: xinput list-props 14 Set the acceleration property. Value may need to be adjusted. xinput set-prop 14 669 -1 From: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/90572/how-can-i-set-mouse-sensitivity-not-just-mouse-acceleration
Edit grub video resolutionhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/edit-grub-video-resolution/Tue, 10 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/edit-grub-video-resolution/Change grub resolution: sudo subl /etc/default/grub Edit (run videotest from grub via c to see supported) GRUB_GFXMODE=1024x768x32 Rebuild grub with this or equiv sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg In the same file you can change the default text resolution by appending the res to this line GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet resume=UUID=75a2dd2e-c8d0-4400-a8c8-182ae551cb8d video=1600x900" Rebuild grub
Fix Teamviewer doesn't launch on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/fix-teamviewer-doesnt-launch-on-arch/Tue, 10 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/fix-teamviewer-doesnt-launch-on-arch/Steps… Download https://archive.archlinux.org/packages/l/lib32-freetype2/lib32-freetype2-2.8-2-x86_64.pkg.tar.xz Move to the folder you downloaded the package. sudo pacman -U lib32-freetype2-2.8-2-x86_64.pkg.tar.xz From: https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?id=230675
Jetbrains toolbox opens to blank windowhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/jetbrains-toolbox-opens-to-blank-window/Mon, 18 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/jetbrains-toolbox-opens-to-blank-window/Launch with arg: --disable-seccomp-filter-sandbox From: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/359236/jetbrains-toolbox-loads-to-a-blank-screen
Open in Guake python script for Nautilushttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/open-in-guake-python-script-for-nautilus/Wed, 13 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/open-in-guake-python-script-for-nautilus/#!/usr/bin/env python import os, subprocess """ Summary: This is a Nautilus script to right click on an item and open in Guake. It tries to be as simple as possible. You need to select a file or folder for this to work. Tested: Arch & python 3 Install: cd .local/share/nautilus/scripts/ vi open_in_guake.py chmod +x open_in_guake.py restart nautilus """ cur_dir = os.getcwd() if os.path.isfile(cur_dir): cur_dir = os.path.dirname(cur_dir) subprocess.call([ u'guake', u'--execute-command=%s' % 'bash', u'--new-tab=%s' % cur_dir, u'--show', u'--rename-current-tab=%s' % os.
The QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME environment variable is not set correctlyhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-qt_qpa_platformtheme-environment-variable-is-not-set-correctly/Fri, 01 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-qt_qpa_platformtheme-environment-variable-is-not-set-correctly/Set environment variable in /etc/environment and add the following line: QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME=qt5ct Restart the system From https://github.com/SwagArch/swagarch-build/issues/6
error: 'somepackage': duplicate target installed using packerhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-somepackage-duplicate-target-installed-using-packer/Sat, 26 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/error-somepackage-duplicate-target-installed-using-packer/When something fails installing with packer, try yaourt. I dont know why this works.
Sync imap accounts with imapsynchttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sync-imap-accounts-with-imapsync/Thu, 24 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/sync-imap-accounts-with-imapsync/Arch AUR handles all perl requirements. Install: packer imapsync Run: imapsync \ --host1 imap.gmail.com -port1 993 --ssl1 --user1 fatty@gmail.com --password1 11111111111111 --delete2 \ --host2 outlook.office365.com -port2 993 --ssl2 --user2 fatty@ms.com --password2 22222222222 --delete2
GitKraken gtk file dialog missing fonts on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/gitkraken-gtk-file-dialog-missing-fonts-on-arch/Mon, 14 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/gitkraken-gtk-file-dialog-missing-fonts-on-arch/Installing fonts didn’t help. Downgraded pango lib to 1.40.5-1 for now. Arch Download: https://archive.archlinux.org/packages/p/pango/ From https://www.reddit.com/r/archlinux/comments/6dodbn/unrecognized_characters_in_gtk_file_chooser/dk38mff/
Install aws cli on arch linuxhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-aws-cli-on-arch-linux/Sat, 29 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-aws-cli-on-arch-linux/packer python-pip sudo pip install –upgrade awscli aws configure vim .aws/config and add [preview] cloudfront = true
Export and import pacman packages on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/export-and-import-pacman-packages-on-arch/Wed, 19 Apr 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/export-and-import-pacman-packages-on-arch/Export… pacman -Qqe | grep -Fvx "$(pacman -Qqm)" > ./fatty-apps.txt Import… xargs pacman -S --needed --noconfirm < ./fatty-apps.txt
jdk location on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/jdk-location-on-arch/Wed, 15 Mar 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/jdk-location-on-arch//usr/lib/jvm/java-6-jdk/
Text tool to get system infohttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/text-tool-to-get-system-info/Fri, 03 Mar 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/text-tool-to-get-system-info/Get system info and a distribution logo. Looks neato. Install packer screenfetch Run screenfetch
Disable laptop touchscreen on Arch linuxhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-laptop-touchscreen/Wed, 01 Mar 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-laptop-touchscreen/This is just my preferred method… “To disable it via xorg.conf, you simply create a file under the /etc/X11/xorg.conf.d directory, for example 99-no-touchscreen.conf with the following content:” Section "InputClass" Identifier "Touchscreen catchall" MatchIsTouchscreen "on" Option "Ignore" "on" EndSection From stackexchange
Install PIA on Archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-pia-on-arch/Wed, 22 Feb 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/install-pia-on-arch/Install private-internet-access-vpn Edit /etc/private-internet-access/login.conf and add username on one line and passwork on next chmod 0600 /etc/private-internet-access/login.conf chown root:root /etc/private-internet-access/login.conf sudo pia -a From https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Private_Internet_Access_VPN
Change grub resolution on archhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-grub-resolution-on-arch/Wed, 15 Feb 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/change-grub-resolution-on-arch/sudo vim /etc/default/grub Change GRUB_GFXMODE=1920x1080x32 Rebuild grub grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg From https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/GRUB/Tips_and_tricks#Setting_the_framebuffer_resolution
Could not open /dev/vmmon: No such file or directoryhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/could-not-open-vmmon/Thu, 02 Feb 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/could-not-open-vmmon/Error: Could not open /dev/vmmon: No such file or directory. Please make sure that the kernel module `vmmon’ is loaded. Fix: vmware-modconfig --console --install-all
Recusively rename files and folders via bashhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/recusively-rename-files-and-folders-via-bash/Sat, 19 Nov 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/recusively-rename-files-and-folders-via-bash/Can’t get rename variants too work reliably. Just using this for now…. find . -name '*[A-Z]*' -type f -exec bash -c 'echo "{}" | mv "{}" "$(tr A-Z a-z)"' \;
Arch random cowsayhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/arch-random-cowsay/Tue, 01 Sep 2015 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/arch-random-cowsay/fortune | cowsay -f $(ls /usr/share/cows/ | shuf -n1) From commandlinefu
Unison sample confighttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/unison-sample-config/Thu, 19 Mar 2015 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/unison-sample-config/A sample for one of my sync’s: # Unison preferences servercmd=/usr/local/bin/unison # Used for OSX ignore = Path vms ignore = Path node_modules ignore = Path bin ignore = Name .FBCIndex ignore = Name .FBCLockFolder ignore = Name {Cache*,.Trash*,.VolumeIcon.icns,.HSicon,Temporary*,.Temporary*,TheFindByContentFolder} ignore = Name {TheVolumeSettingsFolder,.Metadata,.filler,.idsff,.Spotlight,.DS_Store,.CFUserTextEncoding} ignore = Name .localized ignore = Name .fseventsd root = /home/jeffsmithdev/data-local root = ssh://jeffsmithdev@192.168.101.35//Users/jeffsmithdev/data-local
